name: Spot on
author: Shona Holmes
kind: 32-bar reel for any number of couples in a round-the-room formation. All face in, each man has his partner on his right

contents.content:
All advance and men retire while women stay in the middle, pulling
back right shoulder to face their partner. As such, women form an
inner circle facing out while men form an outer circle facing in.

Women dance hands round to the left in the inner circle while men
dance hands round to the left in the outer circle. All finish facing
new partners.

All turn by the right one and a half to finish with men in the centre
facing out and women on the outside facing in.

Women dance hands round to the right in the outer circle while men
dance hands round to the right in the inner circle. All finish facing
original partners.
Women dance back-to-back with the man to the left of their partner.
All take promenade hold and dance round the circle anti-clockwise.

description.more:
in July 2022. Our lovely Unit 2/3 teacher Rachel Shankland started every
day with a fun warm up dance and often described our better moments in
dancing and teaching as “Spot on”. Thus, this easy warm up dance was born;
the circles in bars 9-12 and 17-20 create perfect spots. Thank you Rachel!
